title: Questions about end of life and hospice
description: Multiple videos on end-of-life care and planning, covering CPR and DNR decisions, prognosis, palliative care and hospice, and ensuring personal wishes are honored. Topics also include grief and bereavement, coping and family conversations, maintaining hope, meaning and legacy-making, what to expect from hospice (including medications), and supportive online resources.
